name: Adonis Linux
short_description: Overall, Adonis Linux aims to be a very simple, easy to use operating system. At the same time, it still encourages people to do any task there preferred way, whether it’s a GUI app, a CLI interface or some terminal commands. How you want to do something is your choice; Nothing will be hidden behind a GUI so you can customize as much as you want; however at the same time, you will never be forced to input a series of strange commands into the terminal to accomplish something if that’s not something you want to do.  Adonis Linux strives to help newer users to Linux to transition to the system quickly, as well as support long time users so that everyone can help grow and work towards something that we can all appreciate.
summary: A linux OS with a vision
